pasugiya rajaya yatathe warimarga departhamenthuwa mangin aarambha karanu labu 'gin - nilwala wyapruthiyak sandaha aththikaram mudal washayen 5%ka mudalak china samagamakata gewimata porondu wi ema mudala 4.23%lesa gewimata anumathiya labadi wyapruthiya aarambha nokirimata salaswa rupiyal miliyana 4,012ka mudalak rajayata padu sidu kirime siddhiyak sambandhayen warimarga amathyanshaye hitapu lekam ayiwan da silwa yana ayata kolambaa kotuwa mahesthrath saha athireka disa winisuru lanka jayarathna menewiya pereda (16da) warenthu nikuth kalaya.

pranandu debas, thira rachanaya saha adhyakshanaya - sunil soma piris kathawa - ‘mayikal raj’ damila chithrapataya anusarayeni sahaya adhyakshanaya – lakshman senewirathna, wipula ellawala, jayawira kamarakaranaya – am. ee. gafur kamara sahaya – nimal nakandala, bandula kure, nobat rathnasiri, pathmasiri piris, sheltan kostha, ee. em. lakshman, jagath sanskaranaya - kumarasiri da silwa sahaya – upali amarathunga, wajila shri madhuranga anga rachanaya – eebat wijesinha sahaya – ji.
